title: Instant Pot Spaghetti & Meatballs

Oil & Aromatics: 1 tbsp (3 cloves) garlic, crushed or minced
Main: 3 cups broth (e.g., 3 tsp Garlic Better Than Bouillon + 3 cups water)
Optional Creamy: 5.2 oz Boursin cheese or 4 oz cream cheese

steps: Select Sauté (More/High) in the Instant Pot; add oil and butter, then cook shallots and garlic 3 minutes.
Add meatballs, broth, 1½ cups marinara, oregano, and optional spicy ingredients. Stir to combine.
Break spaghetti in half and layer it into the pot without stirring; press down so liquid covers noodles.
Top with cherry tomatoes. Secure lid, pressure cook High for 8 minutes, then quick-release.
Stir the pasta; add remaining marinara, Parmesan, and optional creamy ingredients. Stir and let rest 3–5 minutes to thicken.
Serve in bowls with extra Parmesan if desired.
